title: EIL Notification 2026 - Apply Online for 06 Junior Secretary Posts
description: The Engineers India Limited (EIL) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 06 Junior Secretary Posts. Interested and eligibile can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed any degree can apply for the EIL Notification 2026. The interested applicants can apply in online mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection process, application fee, salary, and how to apply for th...
